strapiJob.title: Registered Nurse
strapiJob.description:
If you join our team you will have the opportunity to be part of our team who works with and for our community to provide quality healthcare for our family, friends, and neighbors. Additionally, as part of our team you will be eligible for the following benefits:

  • Relocation assistance of up to $5,000
  • Educational Assistance Program granting up to $5,000 per year
  • Clinical Advancement program with annual bonuses of $1,000 to-$2,000
  • Loan Repayment program up to $3,000/yr for ADN or BSN degrees
  • Hospital discount for plan participants through CHS affiliated hospitals (co-insurance is written off)
  • 401K program with a company match
  • Adoption Assistance
